quests.Title: Main Quest
quests.Description: The main story of this game.

objectives.Title: Go to the cemetary.
objectives.Description: Take flowers to the cemetary and pay your respects.

objectives.Title: Sword Lesson.
objectives.Description: Learn how to use your weapons!
objectives.Hint: Use the dpad to change weapons.

objectives.Title: Find Mom!
objectives.Description: She has been taken by bandits!

objectives.Title: Bow Lesson.
objectives.Description: Learn how to use your weapons!
objectives.Hint: Use the dpad to change weapons.

objectives.Title: Kill stuff
objectives.Hint: These things are found in the forest.
